name: @purecore/agentic-networkfortress

scripts.example:a2a: bun build examples/a2a-ultra-secure.ts --outdir dist/examples --target node && bun run dist/examples/a2a-ultra-secure.js
scripts.example:mtls: bun build examples/mtls-agents.ts --outdir dist/examples --target node && bun run dist/examples/mtls-agents.js
scripts.example:secure: bun build examples/secure-agents.ts --outdir dist/examples --target node && bun run dist/examples/secure-agents.js

author: suissAI
description: One JWT FTW is a library for validating and verifying JSON Web Tokens (JWT) using always the newest and more secure native cryptographic algorithm.
